name: server-type-suggestions
description: VS Code extension for API request schema completion

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.package: code --uninstall-extension undefined_publisher.server-type-suggestions; rm server-type-suggestions-1.0.0.vsix; npm run compile; npm run compile && vsce package --allow-missing-repository && code --install-extension server-type-suggestions-1.0.0.vsix
